name: circuit-runner
description: A runtime program that takes one or more circuits, compiles and executes them.

circuits.description: A circuit or a list of QuantumCircuits or a list of QASM 2.0 strings or a Dict of QasmQobj/PulseQobj.

shots.description: Number of repetitions of each circuit, for sampling. Default: 1024.

memory.description: Whether to return per-shot measurement bitstrings.

qubit_lo_freq.description: List of job level qubit drive LO frequencies in Hz. Overridden by schedule_los if specified.

meas_lo_freq.description: List of measurement LO frequencies in Hz. Overridden by schedule_los if specified.

schedule_los.description: Experiment level LO frequency configurations for qubit drive and measurement channels, in Hz.

meas_level.description: The measurement output level. Level 2 is the discriminated measurement counts. Level 1 is the IQ measurement kernel values.

meas_return.description: Type of measurement data to return. Only applicable for meas_level=1. If 'single' is specified, per-shot information is returned. If 'avg' is specified, average measurement output is returned.

use_measure_esp.description: Whether to use excited state promoted (ESP) readout for measurements, which are the terminal instruction to a qubit. ESP readout can offer higher fidelity than standard measurement sequences.

header.description: User input that will be attached to the job and will be copied to the corresponding result header.

noise_model.description: Noise model to use. Only applicable if running on a simulator.

seed_simulator.description: Random seed to control sampling. Only applicable if running on a simulator.

init_qubits.description: Whether to reset the qubits to the ground state for each shot.

return_values.description: Circuit execution results in a RunnerResult object.
